UserConstraints

User-defined waypoints that routers should respect in Guided mode. In Guided mode, the router should calculate a path that passes through these constraint points while avoiding obstacles.

public IReadOnlyList<Point>? UserConstraints { get; init; }

Property Value

IReadOnlyList<Point>

Remarks

This is typically populated from UserWaypoints when the edge's RoutingMode is Guided.
